title: Inexplicable
alt: 'It has a ghost in it. Take it back.' 'No.'
transcript:
[Cueball sits at a desk with a laptop, making a fist at it.]
Cueball: Argh!
Megan (off-screen): What?
Cueball: Why do I always have these inexplicable, impossible-to-diagnose computer problems?[Megan walks up to the desk.]
Cueball: After six hours of this, I've concluded nothing works or makes sense. I give up on logic.
Megan: *sigh* Gimme. I'll figure it out.
Cueball: You won't.[Cueball sits at his laptopless desk while Megan works on the laptop off-screen.]
type type
Click
Megan: ?
type type type
Megan: ???[Megan is back in front of the desk, clutching the laptop.]
Cueball: How'd it go?
Megan: Your computer is literally haunted.
Cueball: Told you.
